column2: title=George Allen and Unwin Spring Announcements 1937

column1: '''''George Allen and Unwin Spring Announcements 1937''''' is an catalogue from George Allen and Unwin, which includes Tolkien's 'blurb' for The Hobbit.
The blurb was later printed on the front flap of the dustwrapper of the 1st Edition of The Hobbit along with additional remarks by the publisher.
The blurb is also reprinted in [[J.R.R. Tolkien: A Descriptive Bibliography]] and [[The Annotated Hobbit]].<ref>{{webcite
